description:
Bartolomeo and Law look back on Luffy and the Straw Hats’ adventures in the Land of Wano, featuring Zoro and Sanji. Law tells Bartolomeo how Zoro and Sanji thrived during the events leading up to the great battle with Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Special Episode to Admire Zoro-senpai and Sanji-senpai! Barto`s Secret Room 2!
Projekt zu Ehren von Zorro und Sanji! – Bartos geheimes Kämmerchen 2!
Zoro Sanji Senpai Tannou Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya Second!
Épisode spécial : Le jardin secret de Barto, acte 2 !
ゾロ・サンジ先輩堪能企画! バルトの秘密の部屋2[セカンド]!
